reviewText: Getting his feet wet in this one, but still really great material.

A funny comedian, however in this show he is very excessively vulgar to the extreme.  This was not necessary because Chris Porter is a good comedian.  Unfortunately, in this show he does not realize that vulgarity isn't needed and takes away from his humor.
very funny guy  he is a stoner which makes it that much funnier.
If you're a chris porter fan youll love it. If you're a comedy fan youll love it. Porter offers a unique style and is drop dead funny and gives a solid performance for this one
I know funny, and Chris Porter is extremely funny. This is one of the best stand-ups I've ever seen.
Chris Ported is one the best of the new pissed off comic. I rate him up there with Louis CK and Patton Oswalt. He is one funny SOB.
Chris Porter is hilarious. His new stuff on Netflix is even better!
I just find Chris Porter a hilarious comedian.  Keep of the good work.  Love your sense of humor.  I will always be a fan.

Know of Cris Porter from comedy central presents, Loved his performance on comedy central. was full of energy and very funny, so I bought this dvd.
Mistake! I think maybe he was a bit too High, lethargic slow not as funny. I think i will just buy the comedy central dvd with his perfomance on it. Any one want my copy of screaming from the cosmos? Its signed by cris porter.
